attributes.action: Restrict the powers of the BBFC with regard to the banning of videogames
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBFC have recently refused to rate the videogame "Manhunt 2". As such, adults in this country will never be allowed to play this game. Adults should be allowed to make their own decisions with regard to what videogames they want to play. We all understand that this game is extremely violent and unsuitable for children. As such an 18 rating should have been applied.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Restrict the powers of the BBFC with regard to the banning of videogames."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13229.asp
